name: Murder Mystery (Fragments theme)
description:
A simple twine game about a murder mystery. It's your job to find out who the murderer is. (For my Uni project: Theme-Fragments)

Music used:   

David Fesliyan,(2021),Solving The Crime,[Downloaded], Available Online:https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/solving-the-crime/23... [Last Accessed:24/02/2022]
